main.deck module¶

Deck of cards class. produces a deck of cards object to be used by the game class

class main.deck.Card(card_value, suit_value)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class representing a single playing card

determine_img_file()[source]¶

sets the correct image file path from the static resources :return:

determine_name()[source]¶

Simple method to return the full english name of a card

Returns

Full english name of the card

determine_rank()[source]¶

returns the english rank of the card based on the value.

Parameters

value – integer specifying the rank, Where 2 is the lowest value (representing a two card) and 14 is

the Highest Value (representing an Ace) :return: English rank of the card

static determine_suit(suit_value)[source]¶

determines the suite of the card based on the given value (0=Clubs, 1=Diamonds, 2=Hearts, 3=Spades)

Parameters

suit_value – value of the cards suit

Returns

class main.deck.Deck[source]¶

Bases: object

Method to populate the self.cards_all attribute

Returns

list of all 52 playing card objects

draw(num=1)[source]¶

draws the number of cards from the deck as specified.

Parameters

num – the number of cards to draw

Returns

the number of card objecs specified

get_card_from_img_path(img_path)[source]¶

helper method that will return the correct card object based on the image path provided. :param img_path: :return:

order_cards(cards, descending=False)[source]¶

helper method that will order a list of card objects :param cards: :param descending: boolean, should the ordering be descending :return:

reset()[source]¶

resets the cards in the deck. removes all cards from the self.cards_used list and adds all cards to the self.cards_avaliable list

Returns

None

shuffle()[source]¶

shuffles the avaliable cards in the deck, reordering self.avaliable_cards object

Returns

None
